text: Apple Arcade is a video game subscription service by Apple Inc. for iOS, iPadOS, tvOS, and macOS devices. It was announced in March 2019, and launched on September 19, 2019. The service enables unrestricted access to over 100 games on compatible Apple devices and external controllers == Features == Features for Apple Arcade include: * Supported on iPadOS, iOS, macOS, and tvOS. * Users can carry over in-game progress between all devices linked to the same iCloud account. * No ads, in-app purchases, always-on DRM, or data tracking. * Up to six family members are allowed access through family sharing. * Various game controllers are supported, such as the DualShock 4 and Xbox One controllers. == Games == == See also == * Google Play Pass == References == == External links == * Category:2019 in video gaming Category:Video game distribution Category:Apple Inc. services Category:Subscription services
